dataTemplate.name: BCO_SHIPMENTS_NEED_DOC_MAN
dataTemplate.description: BCO Shipments Needing Doc Manager Assigned

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT s.shipment_xid shipment_id, sref2.shipment_refnum_value booking_no, glog_util.remove_domain(s.servprov_gid) carrier, sref3.shipment_refnum_value per_cont, sref4.shipment_refnum_value contract_no, ROUND(s.total_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3) actual_wt, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, TO_CHAR(s.port_discharge_eta,'MM/DD/YYYY') eta, sref5.shipment_refnum_value commodity, sref1.shipment_refnum_value loc, glog_util.remove_domain(ss.status_value_gid) loading_status, s.total_ship_unit_count cont_count, loc1.city dest_city, loc1.country_code3_gid dest_country, sref6.shipment_refnum_value doc_cut_dt, loc2.city origin_city, sref7.shipment_refnum_value transloader, glog_util.remove_domain(sip.involved_party_contact_gid) cust_id FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssu.tag_3 IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN order_release o ON ssul.order_release_gid = o.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON o.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid AND o.order_base_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COST PER CONTAINER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.CONTRACT NO' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref5 ON s.shipment_gid = sref5.shipment_gid AND sref5.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref6 ON s.shipment_gid = sref6.shipment_gid AND sref6.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref7 ON s.shipment_gid = sref7.shipment_gid AND sref7.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.TRANSLOADER LOCATION NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_status ss ON s.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid AND ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.SHIPMENT LOADING STATUS' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' WHERE s.insert_date > SYSDATE - 60 AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT sip.shipment_gid FROM shipment_involved_party sip WHERE sip.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER') AND (:LOCS IS NULL OR (NOT :LOCS IS NULL AND sref1.shipment_refnum_value IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOCS,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt)))
